abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo's administration again delays making a decision on whether to allow hydraulic fracturing; state health commissioner Dr Nirav R Shah says review by his agency of potential effects on health from the drilling was continuing, and he recommends the administration not move forward until it is complete.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is awaiting a review of the potential health effects of hydraulic fracturing, and will thus miss a February deadline to issue a new environmental impact statement.

headline.main: New York Governor Puts Off Decision on Drilling
headline.print_headline: Governor Puts Off Decision On Drilling
headline.seo: Cuomo Delays Decision on Gas Drilling as Health Study Continues

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is awaiting a review of the potential health effects of hydraulic fracturing, and will thus miss a February deadline to issue a new environmental impact statement....
